long_description: FishSeeUV Salmon & Steelhead Marabou Spinners have unmatched Sonic Vibrations due to its convex/concave shape and unique in-line shaft design that allows the blade to spin 360 - the most freely spinning blade on the planet. Coupled with this, is a premium quality, hand-tied, natural looking Marabou tail that features Vibrant, Fluorescent, Glowing UV colors to attract Salmon & Steelhead.
